# Create a vector with NAs in it


```{r}

```
# if there are multiple R objects and you want to take the subset with no missingvalues in any of those object
```{r}
x <- c(1, 2, NA, 4, NA, 5)
y <- c("a", "b", NA, "d", NA, "f")
good <- complete.cases(x, y)
good
```
